name: places/ChIJYT4eY7tZwokRgle15msAwRs
adrFormatAddress: 173 7th Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
I've used him since 2008, mostly for alterations.
Last year I brought in a skirt that I loved for its fit and I had them make others in different fabric.
I was very pleased with the work.. Excellent quility.
I would say he is a quiet and unintrusive  person, maybe even shy. So you will need to speak up if you have questions.

originalText.text: I disagree with all negative reviews. I have come here many years and every alteration I had done on high fashion dresses has been of highest quality. True, the promised dates do not always work out and the opening hours can be a bit erratic-yet one can always call ahead of time-however what should matter the most here is the quality of the work and the work is unmatched. Highly recommend.

text.text: I disagree with all negative reviews. I have come here many years and every alteration I had done on high fashion dresses has been of highest quality. True, the promised dates do not always work out and the opening hours can be a bit erratic-yet one can always call ahead of time-however what should matter the most here is the quality of the work and the work is unmatched. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: I've found them to be polite and helpful.  They made accurate measurements and constructed garments well. I've bought 2 suits and 4 pairs of trousers, made to order.  No complaints. One suit is 10 years old and I still get compliments on it....also they've made me velvet trousers that are superb.

text.text: I've found them to be polite and helpful.  They made accurate measurements and constructed garments well. I've bought 2 suits and 4 pairs of trousers, made to order.  No complaints. One suit is 10 years old and I still get compliments on it....also they've made me velvet trousers that are superb.

originalText.text: My roommate recommended Luigi to me after having her dress hemmed. $15 to rise a low neckline on an expensive dress with hard to work with fabric. My regular tailor (aka my mom) said she couldn't do it. The work came out beautiful! Will definitely be going back. Only thing to note, he says he is up until 7 but really closes at 6PM.

originalText.text: Excellent service! I have been coming to Luigi's since 2010 and have always had a great experience. The owner is kind and professional. I highly recommend this shop.
